message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $75 for the product.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I still think the product is worth more than $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82.50. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I believe we can reach an even better agreement. I am willing to pay $80 for the product.
